markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Sarkorian Survivor](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=73)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

**Region** Broken Lands

</column>

The devastation and carnage of the Worldwound were nearly complete, but you somehow managed to survive it.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Strength, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) skill, and the [Sarkorian History Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Forager](/Feats.aspx?ID=786) skill feat.
name: Sarkorian Survivor

text: Sarkorian Survivor Source World Guide pg. 34 2.0 Region Broken Lands The devastation and carnage of the Worldwound were nearly complete, but you somehow managed to survive it. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution or Strength, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Survival skill, and the Sarkorian History Lore skill. You gain the Forager skill feat.
